snippet.title: [TRAILER] The Ultimate VR Racing Game, Dash Dash World, is OUT for Oculus Rift, Quest & Quest 2!
snippet.description:
Drive, Shoot & Drift like NEVER before. Dash Dash is a cross-platform VR kart racing game equipped with immersive full-hand driving and weapon controls.

Lose yourself in hundreds of hours of gameplay. Including a fascinating story mode, exhilarating online tournaments, more than a trillion customization combinations, and hundreds of achievements for the trophy hunters out there! 

Key features 😍
Cross Buy for Rift & Quest
Race up to 8 friends
Offline Story mode
Over 100 hours of Gameplay, Quests & Achievements
All original & unique tracks
Cross-platform play
Cloud save
Regular online tournaments

Extras ✨
Motion sickness prevention options
Onboarding class for new VR racer
Game for everyone with Casual & Hardcore racing modes
Social with meme, stickers, voice chat & dance moves
Customize every detail from your outfit down to the rim of your car

Coming soon 🤩
More Maps
More Weapons
More online Tournaments



That opportunity is now yours. https://DashDashRacing.com 🏎

Oculus Quest & Rift - https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/2159739540797724

SteamVR Wishlist - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1159860/Dash_Dash_World

PSVR - Coming soon!


LET’S CONNECT👇
🙌 Discord - https://discord.gg/mHSgbsA

💁🏻‍♀️ FB Group - https://www.facebook.com/groups/DashDashRacing
🤖 Reddit - https://www.reddit.com/r/DashDashRacing
💁🏻‍♂️ Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/DashDashRacing
🐦 Twitter - https://www.twitter.com/DashDashRacing
📸 Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/DashDashRacing
📽️ Youtube - https://www.youtube.com/DashDashRacing



#dashdashworld #dashdashracing #vr #virtualreality #oculus #quest #oculusquest #psvr #playstation4 #steamvr #vrkart

As always, there is a Redeem code hidden in our video ;)
